typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Client ID} as string,
		{Dealer ID} as string,
		{Customer ID} as string,
		{New or Used} as string,
		{Vehicle Type} as string,
		{Vehicle ID} as string,
		{Stock Number} as string,
		{Registration Number} as string,
		{Registration Date} as string,
		{Dealership Date in Stock} as string,
		Mileage as string,
		{Stock Value} as string,
		{Sale Date} as string,
		{Invoice Number} as string,
		{Sales Executive ID} as string,
		{Full Invoice Value} as string,
		{Paint Value} as string,
		{Warranty Value} as string,
		{GAP Value} as string,
		{Wheel Protection Value} as string,
		{Add on Product 1} as string,
		{Add on Product 2} as string,
		{Add on Product 3} as string,
		{Add on Product 4} as string,
		{Accessory Value} as string,
		Reconditioning as string,
		{Finance Commission} as string,
		Financed as string,
		{Total Gross Profit} as string,
		{Sale Type} as string,
		{Part Exchange Stock Number 1} as string,
		{Part Exchange Stock Number 2} as string,
		{Part Exchange Stock Number 3} as string,
		Source as string,
		{Vehicle Category Code} as string,
		{Purchaser ID} as string,
		Supplier as string,
		{Available Date} as string,
		{Accessory Profit} as string,
		{Paint Profit} as string,
		{Warranty Profit} as string,
		{GAP Profit} as string,
		{Other Profit} as string,
		{Add On Product 1 Profit} as string,
		{Add On Product 2 Profit} as string,
		{Add On Product 3 Profit} as string,
		{Add On Product 4 Profit} as string,
		{Volume Bonus} as string,
		{Other Bonus} as string,
		{RFL Profit} as string,
		{Metal Profit} as string,
		{Metal Invoice Value} as string,
		{Delivery Date} as string,
		{Group Purchase Date} as string,
		{Received Date} as string,
		{Purchase Account} as string,
		{Sales Account ID} as string,
		{Sales Account Name} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	dateFormats: ['dd/MM/yyyy'],
	wildcardPaths:['DetailedVehSales*.csv']) ~> DetailedSales
DetailedSales sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ClientID as integer,
		Dealer as string,
		CustId as string,
		Title as string,
		Forename as string,
		Surname as string,
		Email as string,
		HomePhone as string,
		Mobile as string,
		Add1 as string,
		Add2 as string,
		Add3 as string,
		Add4 as string,
		Postcode as string,
		NewOrUsed as string,
		Type as string,
		VehMagic as string,
		StockNo as string,
		Chassis as string,
		RegistrationNo as string,
		RegistrationDate as date,
		DateInStock as date,
		CapVin as string,
		CapCode as string,
		Make as string,
		Model as string,
		Derivative as string,
		EngineSize as string,
		Bodystyle as string,
		Mileage as integer,
		Fuel as string,
		Transmission as string,
		GenericColour as string,
		SpecificColour as string,
		Doors as string,
		Siv as double,
		SaleDate as date,
		InvNumber as integer,
		SalesExec as string,
		FullInvValue as double,
		Paint as double,
		Warr as double,
		Gap as double,
		Acc as double,
		Recon as double,
		FinanceCommission as double,
		Profit as double,
		SaleType as string,
		Px1 as string,
		Px2 as string,
		Px3 as string,
		Source as string,
		ModelAnalysisCode as string,
		Purchaser as string,
		SupplierName as string,
		PurchaseInvoiceDate as date,
		AvailableDate as date,
		AccessoryProfit as double,
		PaintProfit as double,
		WarrProfit as double,
		GapProfit as double,
		OtherProfit as double,
		VolumeBonus as double,
		Bonus as double,
		RflProfit as double,
		MetalProfit as double,
		VehicleInvoiceValue as double,
		DeliveryDate as date,
		GroupPurchaseDate as date,
		ReceivedDate as date,
		DateInGroup as date,
		PurchaseAccount as string,
		FuelTypeID as string,
		SalesAccountID as string,
		SalesAccountName as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['truncate table dbo.DMSVehicleSales'],
	postSQLs:['update dbo.DMSVehicleSales set ClientID = 10000 where ClientID is null'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	transactionCommit: 'single',
	reportSuccessOnError: false,
	mapColumn(
		Dealer,
		CustId = {Cust ID},
		Title,
		Forename = forename,
		Surname,
		Email = email,
		HomePhone = {home phone},
		Mobile = mobile,
		Add1 = {add 1},
		Add2 = {add 2},
		Add3 = {add 3},
		Add4 = {add 4},
		Postcode = postcode,
		NewOrUsed = {New or Used},
		Type = type,
		VehMagic = {Veh Magic},
		StockNo = {stock no},
		Chassis = chassis,
		RegistrationNo = {reg no},
		RegistrationDate = {reg date},
		DateInStock = {date in stock},
		CapVin = {CAP VIN},
		CapCode = {CAP code},
		Make = make,
		Model = model,
		Derivative = derivative,
		EngineSize = {engine size},
		Bodystyle = bodystyle,
		Mileage = mileage,
		Fuel = fuel,
		Transmission = transmission,
		GenericColour = {generic colour},
		SpecificColour = {specific colour},
		Doors = doors,
		Siv = SIV,
		SaleDate = {sale date},
		InvNumber = {inv number},
		SalesExec = {sales exec},
		FullInvValue = {full inv value},
		Paint = paint,
		Warr = warr,
		Gap = GAP,
		Acc,
		Recon = recon,
		FinanceCommission = {Finance commission},
		Profit = profit,
		SaleType = {Sale type},
		Px1 = PX1,
		Px2 = PX2,
		Px3 = PX3,
		Source,
		ModelAnalysisCode = {Model Analysis Code},
		Purchaser,
		PurchaseInvoiceDate = {Purchase Invoice Date},
		AvailableDate = {Available Date},
		AccessoryProfit = {Accessory Profit},
		PaintProfit = {Paint Profit},
		WarrProfit = {Warr Profit},
		GapProfit = {Gap Profit},
		OtherProfit = {Other Profit},
		VolumeBonus = {Volume Bonus},
		Bonus,
		RflProfit = {RFL Profit},
		MetalProfit = {Metal Profit},
		VehicleInvoiceValue = {Vehicle Invoice Value},
		DeliveryDate = {Delivery Date},
		GroupPurchaseDate = {Group Purchase Date},
		ReceivedDate = {Received Date},
		DateInGroup = {Date In Group},
		PurchaseAccount = {Purchase Account},
		FuelTypeID = {Fuel Type},
		SalesAccountID = {Sales Account ID},
		SalesAccountName = {Sales Account Name}
	)) ~> SQLDMSDetailedSales
